required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of ALS-L1023 in Subjects With NASH
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Phase 2a Study to Explore the Safety and Efficacy of ALS-L1023 in Patients With Non-alcoholic Steatohepatitis (NASH)

brief_summary.textblock: The main objective of this study is to evaluate safety and efficacy of ALS-L1023 in patients with Non-alcoholic steatohepatitis

detailed_description.textblock:
Besides the main objectives, there are other objectives as follows:
1. To evaluate efficacy of ALS-L1023 for liver fibrosis and steatosis by noninvasive imaging biomarker MRI-PDFF and MRE
2. To determine optimized dose of ALS-L1023 in NASH disease

primary_outcome.measure: Change in liver fat percentage measured by MRI-PDFF
primary_outcome.description: Liver fat is measured by MRI-PDFF

primary_outcome.measure: Change in liver fibrosis measured by MRE
primary_outcome.description: Liver fibrosis is measured by Magnetic Resonance Enterography

primary_outcome.measure: Change in visceral fat area measured by MRI
primary_outcome.description: Visceral fat area is measured by MRI

primary_outcome.measure: Changes in serum concentrations of ALT and AST
primary_outcome.description: ALT and AST concentrations in serum are measured

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in serum concentration of Pro-C3
secondary_outcome.description: Pro-C3 concentration in serum is measured

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in serum concentration of CK-18
secondary_outcome.description: CK-18 concentration in serum is measured

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in insulin sensitivity determined by HOMA-IR
secondary_outcome.description: Insulin sensitivity is determined by Homeostatic Model Assessment for Insulin Resistance

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in serum concentration of Leptin
secondary_outcome.description: Concentration of Leptin in serum is measured

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in serum concentrations of ALT and AST
secondary_outcome.description: ALT and AST concentrations in serum are measured

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in serum concentrations of TG and TC
secondary_outcome.description: Triglyceride and Total Cholesterol concentrations in serum are measured

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in serum concentration of Ghrelin
secondary_outcome.description: Concentration of Ghrelin in serum is measured

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in serum concentration of Adiponection
secondary_outcome.description: Concentration of Adiponection in serum is measured

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Men or women ages 19 and over, under 75 years of age
- Patients diagnosed with NAFLD on abdominal ultrasonography and MRI
- Patients show presence of hepatic fat fraction as defined by ≥ 8% on MRI-PDFF and liver stiffness as defined by ≥ 2.5 kPa on MRE at Screening
Exclusion Criteria:
- Any subject with current, significant alcohol consumption or a history of significant alcohol consumption for a period of more than 3 consecutive months any time within 2 year prior to screening will be excluded
- Chronic liver disease (including hemochromatosis, liver cancer, autoimmune liver disease, viral hepatitis A, B, alcoholic liver disease
- Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus as defined by a HbA1c ≥ 9.0％ at Screening
- Patients who are allergic or hypersensitive to the drug or its constituents
- Pregnant or lactating women
